original_text: through the middle of the street of the city; also, on either side of the river, the tree of life with its twelve kinds of fruit, yielding its fruit each month. The leaves of the tree were for the healing of the nations.
korean_text: 길 가운데로 흐르더라 강 좌우에 생명나무가 있어 열두 가지 열매를 맺되 달마다 그 열매를 맺고 그 나무 잎사귀들은 만국을 치료하기 위하여 있더라

sentences.original_text: through the middle of the street of the city
also, on either side of the river
the tree of life with its twelve kinds of fruit
sentences.korean_translation: 열두 가지 열매를 맺는 생명 나무가

sentences.original_text: were for the healing of the nations
